topic.title: PERSON GENOTYPIC SEX (NATIONAL NEONATAL DATA SET)
topic.shortdesc: The genotypic (chromosomal) sex of a PERSON, recorded for the purposes of the National Neonatal Data Set - Episodic and Daily Care and the National Neonatal Data Set - Two Year Neonatal Outcomes Assessment.
